description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 2d10+5 damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+25 vs AC; 1d10+5 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes a bite attack and a claw attack.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an enemy misses the dragon with a melee attack, at-will

The dragon attacks the target; targets the enemy that missed it; +25 vs AC; 2d8+5 damage.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Close blast 5

+23 vs Fortitude; 2d10+5 necrotic damage, and the target loses one healing surge and is weakened (save ends). Aftereffect: The target's necrotic damage is negated until the end of the encounter. Miss: Half damage, and the target does not lose a healing surge.

Encounter ✦ Necrotic

Free, Encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +23 vs Will; the target is dazed until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Zone

Minor 1/Round

Area burst 2 within 10

Sustain Minor

This power creates a zone of darkness that remains in place until the end of the dragon's next turn. The zone blocks line of sight for all creatures except the dragon. Any creature entirely within the area (except the dragon) is blinded.
The shadow dragon deals an extra 4d6 damage against a target it has combat advantage against.
The dragon deals an extra 2d6 damage with all attacks while it is bloodied.

At-Will ✦ Teleportation

Move

A shadow dragon that is in at least one square of a globe of darkness can teleport to any other globe of darkness within line of sight. It must end this move in at least one square of that globe of darkness.

system.biography:
HP 730; Bloodied 365
Resist 30 necrotic Vulnerable radiant (whenever a shadow dragon takes radiant damage, one of its globes of darkness ends) 		Init +24 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 36Fort 34Ref 36Will 32
Speed 10, fly 10 (hover), overland flight 20, swim 10
Ability ScoresStr 24 (+17)
Con 20 (+15)		Dex 28 (+19)
Int 18 (+14)		Wis 21 (+15)
Cha 17 (+13)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Intimidate +18, Stealth +24Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 25 | Insight 25
